removing them from the needle without all of your hard work unravelling 1 knit 2 stitches do not slip the 2 use the left needle tip to lift the first stitch worked over the second first stitch as you have been on stitch and off the end of the needle previous row 3 knit the next stitch repeat steps 2 and 3 until you have set the left needle aside repeat only 2 stitches left step 2 once more to bind off the last stitch cut the yarn leaving a 6 / 15cm or longer tail and pull the last stitch until the tail end pops loose garter stitch scarf by ysolda v1 1 7 how to weave in ends in garter stitch thread the tail onto a tapestry follow the path of your stitches pull the yarn just until the gauge needle to weave in the end you ll have to matches that of your knitting open up the fabric to see the top legs of a stitch continue weaving in the end in this way across a row of stitches for at least 2 / 5cm then trim the end close to the surface share your project i m so excited for you to begin
